title: Old Shatterhand
occurrences: Tujunga is proud that Old Shatterhand has not forgotten him.
I will be there soon, too. - Old Shatterhand won't go with me?
It's high time for me to arrive, Dixon! - Sure thing,Old Shatterhand is back!
That's why you called for me? Who is Old Shatterhand anyways!
Old Shatterhand is also befriended with General Taylor.
Let him enter! This is Old Shatterhand!
This is Old Shatterhand, the friend of the Indians. Don't you know him?
Bend over guys: this is Old Shatterhand, noble protector of the Indians.
I am the friend of Old Shatterhand! - Nice to meet you!
That is Old Shatterhand!
He is called Old Shatterhand and he has only one love and that is a dream.
Then you have hate me, too. - No, Old Shatterhand belongs to us.
If Old Shatterhand presents that prove,
Winnetou is thankful to the great warrior and to his brother Old Shatterhand.
Old Shatterhand.
Listen: we trapped Old Shatterhand. He is at Joe Burger's farm.           - I see!
I've heard that men talking about Old Shatterhand being trapped.
Old Shatterhand and the girl ...
Do you have the contract? - Old Shatterhand got it.
And Bush ... Bring Old Shatterhand to me.
